rulesets.description: Enforces code quality and testing standards on the main branch

instructions:
To apply these rulesets via GitHub CLI with admin access:

gh api --method POST repos/fatcrapinmybutt/fredprime-legal-system/rulesets -f name='Enforce Code Quality on Main' -f target='branch' -f enforcement='active' -f conditions='...' -f rules='...'

Or use the GitHub Web UI: Settings > Rules and security > Rulesets
